short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize the background and font color of the selected text content by the mouse. Used to protect the eyes during reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
自定义鼠标选中的文本内容的背景、字体颜色。用于阅读时候保护眼睛。
Customize the background and font color of the selected text content by the mouse. Used to protect the eyes during reading.
